roleset.name: experiencing partial paralysis
roleset.note: PARETIC-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in Thyme, framed by Claire. Comparison to paralyze-v.01. (from paretic.01-j)

roles.note: Not sure if expression of Arg0 is possible with this form, but is present for symmetry with paralyze. (from paretic.01-j)
